ygData.subject: Re: Back to Innoruuk
ygData.msgSnippet: That s why I suggest that if we ever have a guild, the name should be Valient but disorganize as hell and extremely fickle minded Saints. BBC = Bone Blade
ygData.messageBody:
That's why I suggest that if we ever have a guild, the name should be

"Valient but disorganize as hell and extremely fickle minded Saints."

BBC = Bone Blade Claymore, a magical 2 handed sword. Damage quite high but it
reduces agility if I remember correctly. A Ghoulblade is better though since it
does around the same damage-delay, can use shield some more and would randomly
cast dismiss undead.
